name: @liquid-labs/federated-json
description: Library that builds a single JSON object from multiple JSON files.

scripts.build: JS_SRC=src/fjson catalyst-scripts build && rollup-bash src/cli/fjson.sh dist/fjson.sh
scripts.pretest: JS_SRC=src/fjson catalyst-scripts pretest && mkdir -p test-staging/test/data/datadir && cp src/fjson/test/data/*.json test-staging/test/data && cp src/fjson/test/data/datadir/*.json test-staging/test/data/datadir
scripts.preversion: JS_SRC=src npm run lint && npm test

author: Zane Rockenbaugh <zane@liquid-labs.com>
